amendment.description: To add the Select Committee on Intelligence and the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence of the House of Representatives as recipients of the report of the panel on the future of military space launch.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3480 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3480 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7270-7273; text: CR S7272) To add the Select Committee on Intelligence and the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence of the House of Representatives as recipients of the report of the panel on the future of military space launch.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3480 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3480 proposed by Senator Warner.
